oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ligation of the external pudenal artery and vein for the treatment of Gangrenous Mastitis
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kerfoot, Michael
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: mastitis
ligation
external pudenal artery and vein
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In certain acute cases of gangrenous mastitis ( blue bag) , I have found it worthwhile to include a ligation technique of the external pudenal artery and vein to decrease the amount of toxic substances in the general circulation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1982; 151-152
